alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 4:00AM CDT until May 07 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Garfield County in north central Nebraska... Southwestern Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 359 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fort Hartsuff State Park, or 8 miles north of Ord, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Ericson and Pibel Lake State Recreation Area. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 134. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
